stats.passive1: Chilling Smite: Upgrades Smite to Chilling Smite. Chilling Smite can be cast on enemy champions, dealing 28 - 166 (based on level) true damage and stealing 20% of their movement speed for 2 seconds.
stats.passive2: Tooth and Nail: Basic attacks versus monsters deal 25 bonus physical damage and grant 15% bonus attack speed for 2 seconds. Damaging a monster by any means set it aflame, dealing an additional 50 magic damage over 5 seconds while causing you to restore 6 health per second for every enemy you're burning.
stats.passive3: Restoration: While in the jungle or river, grants 1 mana regeneration per 5 seconds for every 2% of missing mana.
stats.active: Unique : Control: Consume a charge to place a  Control Ward. Charges are refilled by killing large monsters in the enemy jungle or returning to the shop.
